src_original: 01509 cāritramatir nāma bodhisattvaḥ {{mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā
tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān  ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ
ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya
evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad}} avocat/

01509 cāritramatir nāma bodhisattvaḥ {{mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā  tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān  ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ  pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat /
ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya
